data.value:
Dear ${donor},

We want to thank you for your donation of ${amount}(${currency}) to ${project} on ${donationdate}. We appreciate your support a lot!

Through your contribution we can continue to improve the life of others. OI does not charge any fees for projects, they are covered by our sponsors.

We would love to keep our OI platform free of charge. You can also contribute to this by becoming our sponsor.

This email is serving as a 501(c)(3) tax-compliant donation receipt, for your records, and declaring that no goods or services were provided by the not-for-profit organization in return for the contribution. EIN (US-tax #): 82-1707895.
